recipesJson.name: wood and tobacco
recipesJson.author: spicygal
recipesJson.description: flavor pro challenge - untested recipe - going for what the picture looks like-  day 5 pleasant vape a bit dry.  if you like dry tobaccos it's for you.  but i think i'll add sweet cream or something to it - okay at two weeks it's a decent tobacco but not very woodsy and still a bit dry - think I will change up the recipe some.  Okay increased the wood spice and decreased the fresh cream and added milk & honey
